name: Squad SGD
description:
Being the sole daughter of a famous star pilot, you are destined to honor his legacy. Everyone needs to learn the ropes before tackling more dangerous tasks, and luckily for you such an opportunity has emerged with your new job at ST Industries. 

Prove your worth as a valued member of the Space Garbage Disposal (SGD) Squad in Recycling Belt A-1 far above Earth's exosphere. Earn recognition as someone worthy of your family name.
